name: Hallowed Reed
description: The Hallowed Reed is a celestial creature embodying purity, noted for its distinctive presence and slow movement.
memorable: It can regenerate by growing a new patch if destroyed, symbolizing life and restoration.
goals: To support and protect good-aligned creatures while hindering evil forces.
relations: It can communicate with other good-aligned beings through limited telepathy.
environment: Typically found in serene, life-filled areas, potentially where other good-aligned entities dwell.
strengths: Immunity to radiant damage and can resist bludgeoning and piercing damage.
weaknesses: Low mobility and vulnerability to aggressive tactics during combat.
attacks: Searing Grasp attack deals radiant damage and grapples targets, especially effective against undead and fiends.
most_powerful_ability: Rebirth, allowing it to grow anew after death unless specific actions are taken to prevent this.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet, remaining blind beyond this range.
skills: Exhibits strong perception with a +4 bonus.
additional_information: Knows if nearby creatures are good-aligned through Like Calls to Like ability.
Can communicate non-verbally with good creatures within 100 feet using images and emotions.
Effective in combat against undead and fiends due to its grappling abilities.
test_queries: creature that grapples with radiant damage
guardian of good creatures with rebirth ability
